subject: Economy
A_en: Decrease in the value of currency
C_en: Rise in the prices of goods and services
D_en: Decrease in the purchasing power of money
explanation_en: Inflation is the increase in the prices of goods and services. It reduces the purchasing power of money. Inflation affects the overall economy by altering the cost of living and making it harder for consumers to buy the same amount of goods and services with the same amount of money.
